values: woah I haven't updated in like 979723479023840 years. anywho well heres the most recent stuff on my life! well I got my permit and I've been driving like a maniac. actually I'm kidding. I'm a really good driver I just can't go the speed limit. I swear its not possible for me to not speed!!! I don't wanna be one of those drivers that other people are like CMON BITCH MOVE THE CAR!!! hehe. well I've finally stopped talking to matt...FOR GOOD. my friends finally snapped me to reality and made me realize that I was constantly putting myself through the same thing over and over and over again. so yeah well glad thats all over! I really don't even see the need to talk to him anymore period. well thats how the cookie crumbles! I went to Cincinatti last weekend and that was tons of fun. I finally got to see a hocky game again. I missed my hockey so much!!!  :(  during hockey and baseball season that is my life. but yeah tonight I'm goin shoppin and seein phantom of the opera with kate! should be a blast! woohoo girls night!!! LATER!!!

They got a lotta girls
who know they got it going on
but nothing's ever a comparison to you
Now cant you see that your the only one i really want
and everything i need
is everything you do?

Any girl walk by, dont matter
'cause your looking so much better
Dont ever need to get 
caught up in jealousy
She could a super-model
every magazine...the cover
She'll never, ever mean a thing to me...

Shes no you... oh, no
You give me more than i could ever want
She's no you
Im satisfied with the one I've got
'cause your all the girl
that i've ever dreamed
She's only a picture on a magazine
Shes no you... shes no you


dont you wish all guys were like that?!?!?!?!!? and all boyfriends would pick you over a stupid super model just because he thinks your so much more than her?



It isnt a crime to want
A little space to breathe
But you will be fine
The sun again will shine on you
Whatever you do

Take your sweet, sweet time
I will be here when you change your mind
Take your sweet, sweet time
I will be here for you baby
Anytime

ITS JUST SO CUTE!!!

Staring out at the rain with a heavy heart
It's the end of the world in my mind
Then your voice pulls me back like a wake up call
I've been looking for the answer
Somewhere
I couldn't see that it was right there
But now I know what I didn't know 

Because you live and breathe
Because you make me believe in myself when nobody else can help
Because you live, girl
My world has twice as many stars in the sky


AWWWWWWWW!!!!!!!!!!!!!

i have finally crawled out of my room, my sanctuary. tonight has been nothing short of terrible. im sick and tired of my parents. every time i leave the house they get drunk. tonight i had finally had enough. do they honestly know what it feels like to come home and have to feel like the adult? what would they do if next time they go out i get myself drunk? maybe the saying is true that you can "drink all your worries away" i wish it were that easy. tonight my parents told me i have ruined christmas. according to my mother that also said i ruined thanksgiving, i have ruined her whole life. for some reason i feel that ive messed up a lot lately...im so sick of being alone. once there was a place that was filled and now its not anymore. just monday night kris told me i wasnt his best friend anymore. he also said kayla told him to promise to not talk to me anymore. if anyone else wants to listen to they're significant other on who to be friends with please let me know. i would appreciate knowing how many best friends ive recently lost if i have lost anymore. i never knew i could feel so empty...

Do you ever feel like breaking down?
Do you ever feel out of place?
Like somehow you just don't belong
And no one understands you
Do you ever wanna runaway?
Do you lock yourself in your room?
With the radio on turned up so loud 
That no one hears you screaming

No you don't know what it's like
When nothing feels all right
You don't know what it's like
To be like me

To be hurt
To feel lost
To be left out in the dark
To be kicked when you're down
To feel like you've been pushed around
To be on the edge of breaking down
And no one's there to save you 
No you don't know what it's like
Welcome to my life


With their big fake smiles and stupid lies
While deep inside you're bleeding


There's always that one person
That will always have your heart
You'll never see it coming
Cause you're blinded from the start
Know that you're that one for me

But its still in your eyes my boo
Even though we used to argue it's alright
I know we haven't seen each other
In awhile but you will always be my boo

Yes I remember boy
Cause after we kissed
I could only think about your lips
Yes I remember boy
The moment I knew you were the one 
I could spend my life with
Even before all the fame
And people screaming your name
I was there and you were my baby

Sew this up with threads of reason and regret
So I will not forget. I will not forget
How this felt one year six months ago
I know I cannot forget. I cannot forget

I'm falling into memories of you and things we used to do
Follow me there
A beautiful somewhere
A place that I can share with you

I can tell that you don't know me anymore
It's easy to forget, sometimes we just forget
And being on this road is anything but sure
Maybe we'll forget, I hope we don't forget

I'm falling into memories of you and things we used to do
Follow me there
A beautiful somewhere
A place that I can share with you

So many nights, legs tangled tight
Wrap me up in a dream with you
Close up these eyes, try not to cry
All that I've got to pull me through is memories of you
Memories of you
Memories of you
Memories of you

I'm falling into memories of you and things we used to do
Follow me there
A beautiful somewhere
A place that we can share
Falling into memories of you and things we used to do

My shadow's the only one that walks beside me
My shallow heart's the only thing that's beating
Sometimes I wish someone out there will find me
'Til then I walk alone


here comes the rain again
falling from the stars
drenched in my pain again
becoming who we are

as my memory rests
but never forgets what I lost
wake me up when september ends



yes i know i just used songs from people that most people dont like but these songs are the only thing that can truely relate to how i feel right now. im sick of always putting a smile on and making everyone think im alright. even my closest friends dont know how i feel. somehow ive fooled everyone and for awhile it was alright. i just cant handle it anymore. im 15...this shouldnt be happening....i just wish there was someone that could fix everything thats happening but theres not....except for the person that is doing this to me...


Another turning point, a fork stuck in the road
Time grabs you by the wrist, directs you where to go
So make the best of this test, and don't ask why
It's not a question, but a lesson learned in time

It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right.
I hope you had the time of your life.

So take the photographs, and still frames in your mind
Hang it on a shelf in good health and good time
Tattoos of memories and dead skin on trial
For what it's worth it was worth all the while

It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right. 
I hope you had the time of your life. 

It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right. 
I hope you had the time of your life. 

It's something unpredictable, but in the end it's right. 
I hope you had the time of your life.

Leo - Your Love Profile

Your positive traits:

You're almost always the center of attention - and easy for potential dates to spot
Your happiness and optimism is appealing to all... and contagious!
You don't hold grudges - getting over little fights is no problem for you

Your negative traits:

You tend to ignore relationship problems, until they are too big to handle
You crave luxury, and you are disappointed with partners who can't provide you with it
If someone does you wrong, you'll coldly and cruely break their heart

Your ideal partner:

Someone high status enough to bring you more attention - but not so great that they upstage you
Makes you laugh and brings excitement to everything you do together
Is aggressive and confident enough to butt heads with you every so often

Your dating style:

High expectations. You need to be impressed with an incredible first date for a second one to occur.

Your seduction style:

You like to make the first move - you're fearless about initiating things
Passionate. You really get into any intimate act.
Aggressive. Most of the time, you find yourself wanting sex more than your partner.

Tips for the future:

Try to not need so much attention. You'll feel less ignored, guaranteed.
Learn to love your parnter for who they are - not how they help advance your life.
Let your partner shine occasionally. You don't always have to be the alpha dog.

Best place to meet someone online:

Platnium Romance - these flirty singles will make sure that you're the center of attention

Best color to attract mate: Gold

Best day for a date: Sunday

Get your free love profile at Blogthings.

this weekend was SO FREAKIN AWESOME!!! well friday night we had the band concert and stuff so it wasn't as much fun but i got to hang out with sarah and see some pretty dang funny stuff at the improv show. yesterday had to be the best day of my freakin entire life. well i went to a christian concert all because i thought side walk slam was playing. well as soon as me and brooke drive up to the door we see the bass player for SWS and im like freakin out cus i havent talked to him since church camp. we go in and meet up with hillary. skuf came on first and i had never heard them before. during the first song we were on the outside of the mosh pit (which really sucked) and got knocked down onto one of the pews. well me and hillary litterally jumped into the mosh pit and it was sooo awesome. everyone was pushing people and people were flying everywhere and it was my first time "mosh pitting". well there was a break after skuf and then the wedding came on and yes i must say...im in love with the lead singer. he was absolutley GORGEOUS. he wasnt like the hollister type hot guy but in i different way. when he was singing me and hillary pushed our way to the front so we could be near him oh my goodness you have no clue how dreamy he was. well we went to go get sodas and i saw the guy from side walk slam again. well hillary or brooke wouldn't ask if SWS was playing so i did. i got into a little conversation with him and i was like freaking out it was the best thing in the world. well we went to get the sodas and guess who walks into the room through a different door. the lead singer from the wedding. well we went up and started talking to him and he asked our names and where we were from and stuff and gosh i thought i was going to faint the whole time. i felt like such a little girl cus i was like omg he knows my name!!! it was so great. well matt was there so i went and talked to him for a lil while and it was finally time for the o.c. supertones and hillary and i just HAD to go crowd surfing. we told him to put us up and well him and his friends did. it was the best thing ive ever done in my entire life. crowd surfing has got to be the best thing there is. the concert ended and we had a sleepover at brooke's house. lets just say hill had a tad bit too much soda. brooke and i went to church this morning, went to lunch, then i went to the mall with jeana and did xmas shopping. this weekend couldnt have been better!!!

gosh im so flipping sick of always being blamed for shit i didnt fucking do. I walk in the door from hanging out with my cousin that I never get to see anymore and my mom starts bitching at me about something I didn't even fucking do. I guess one of the people that I'm supposed to be going to a concert with some how got a story that I said and I quote "I'm going with other people find your own ride" okay people does that actually seem like something I would say to one of my best friends?! I think not. I didn't even say that. The most I said was we'll have to figure out rides later like take 2 cars and follow one up there so we can get there at the same time and stuff we just might not be able to fit everyone in one car. THATS IT. Ok I get home and some how the story has gotten to that???? I'm sick of being the one in all these situations to turn out to be the bad person. I HAVENT DONE A DAMN THING TO ANYBODY!!! I HAVENT SAID A DAMN THING TO ANYBODY!!! if i only would have known that Gimme 5 would be playing saturday night I would be there and not having to deal with this dumb shit. I'm thinking about tearing up my ticket and going to see Gimme 5 then no one will have to worry about getting a fucking ride from me!

ya kno i thought spending a friday night not away from home would be terrible but it actually wasnt all that bad. i got my cooler ranch dorritos and other food and sat down and turned off the lights and watched pirates of the caribbean. i really needed that night alone. during the evening last night i went and hung out with kate and kris at the mall for awhile and that was pretty fun even tho the entire time i couldnt stop thinking about matt because i had just talked to him and it was the first time since last sunday. i really thought i was ok again and i thought that i was alright and everything but i guess the real test is to see how you hold up when you hear they're voice again. i hid it really well but inside i was screaming. all i wanted to do was just scream. even when i got home i couldnt stop thinking about everything and every dream i had last night had him in it. gosh i hate this. hes been such an asshole to me lately and hes hurt me so bad so why do i still care so much? why can i just tell him to go to hell and never talk to him again?! gosh this is so frustrating. whats so frustrating about it is that there is no real answer. i cant just go look up an answer for all this on the internet or in a book like i wish i could. my friend mike has been trying to help me by telling me that i have to get everything out and that i should just talk to him but i dunno...maybe its just not a good idea and i should try and forget about everything that has happened and everything he has ever said. i wish it were that easy but this is reality not a fantasy. ive talked to kate about this a lot and shes always telling me that i cant handle another break down and if i tell him everything itll all lead to another break down. i just dont kno...part of me wants to and wants to not believe everything will just repeat itself and the other part of me is saying no dont do it again your just setting yourself up for another heart break. geez things were so much easier when i still thought boys had cooties...heh. maybe i should just pack away all the pictures and everything that reminds me of him and never look at it again. i just dont know what to do. chris is staying at my house tonight and we'll prolly end up having another cry fest cus thats what we always do! but the more i think about it...the more i think kate is right...my life is going to go on as much as i think it wont...and ive already come so far by slightly moving on. things are so much easier said than done...
http://blvdbrokndreams.livejournal.com/9332.html
